definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
cabin/the hold of a ship or airplane

sentences.english: The economy tickets have been fully booked.
You'll never sneer at Premium Economy again.
sentences.chinese: 你永远也不会再对经济舱嗤之以鼻。

sentences.english: Economy class airline seats are, on average, around 18in wide.
sentences.chinese: 经济舱的一般宽度在18英寸左右。

sentences.english: Book me two economy class seats, please. (book)
sentences.chinese: 请给我定两张经济舱的机票。

sentences.english: Book me two economy class seats to Atlanta for Monday morning, please.
sentences.chinese: 请给我定两张周一上午去亚特兰大的经济舱机票。

sentences.english: What kind of ticket do you wish: first clbum or economy?
sentences.chinese: 您想要哪种票，甲第舱，抢先。还是经济舱？

sentences.english: Economy class return flight tickets are provided for locally hired foreigners to their country of residence.
sentences.chinese: 提供当地雇用的外国人回居住国的经济舱往返机票。

sentences.english: Book me two economy class seats on Jal flight 104 to HongKong.
sentences.chinese: 给我订两张去香港的日航104班机的经济舱机票。

sentences.english: Tourist class passengers are prohibited from using the first-class lounge.
sentences.chinese: 经济舱乘客禁用头等舱休息室。

sentences.english: A:Sure we do. First-class or economy?
sentences.chinese: 当然有。头等舱还是经济舱？

sentences.english: A:I'll need an economy ticket with an open return.
sentences.chinese: 我要一张经济舱，回程不定的往返票。

sentences.english: The airline will shrink economy class to make roomfor the new cabin.
sentences.chinese: 为增加新类型的舱位，该公司将缩减经济舱空间。

sentences.english: Buy a coach seat with extra legroom.
sentences.chinese: 购买一个有额外放腿空间的经济舱座位。

sentences.english: Do you want to go economy, business or first class?
sentences.chinese: 你是想坐经济舱，商务舱还是头等舱？

sentences.english: An economy-class ticket to Beijing please.
sentences.chinese: 我要买一张去北京的经济舱机票。

sentences.english: "Coach meals may be less elaborate, " he concedes.
sentences.chinese: 他承认“经济舱飞机餐制作可能没那么精细”。

definition: scheduled flight/flight number/plane/scheduled sailing/sailing number/passenger ship
airline (abbr. for 航空公司[hang2 kong1 gong1 si1])

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1

definition: Hong Kong Dragon Airlines (operating as Dragonair), Hong Kong-based international airline
luggage that has been checked in (on flight)
